To mark the bravery and dedicated service of the RNLI, Highland Park released exactly 1,867 anniversary bottles in January 2018.  Since the Severn class lifeboat stationed in Stromness is 55.9 feet long, they bottled this special edition of Highland Park at 55.9% ABV.
This is one of 1,867 bottles.

NAME: Mortlach - 16 Year Old Distiller's Dram 2.81
DESCRIPTION:
Would you believe us if we said this single malt from the BEAST of Dufftown has been distilled 2.81 times...well you better!! This dram takes its inspiration from the world-renowned and award-winning 1992 16-year-old release!
Mortlach utilises a complex distillation process unlike any other. Three Wash Stills and three spirit stills are all unique in shape, size and have been hand cut. 
They believe that for 70 years, Mortlach has been the best kept secret in Scotch whisky.

NAME: Ardbeg - Alligator - 5cl Mini
DESCRIPTION:
An alligator skin is one that looks cracked and full of scars that would have been caused during a heated battle. Well, that exactly where the name of this whisky comes from. When heat is applied to the inside of a cask, the wood begins to crack...'alligator char'.
This is the un-tammed release which came after the committee release in 2012.

NAME: Ardbeg - Ardbeg Day Feis Ile 2012 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg always has an annual Feis Ile bottling and this little beauty was released on 1st June 2012.
12,000 were produced and married in ex refill sherry casks.
Available at the distillery and online to committee members.
This is a 5cl bottling.

NAME: Wolfburn - Ansuz The Kylver Series (4th Release)
DESCRIPTION: Wolfburns 4th release of the Kylver series.   Each bottle has a letter from the runic alpabet, which was on the Kylver stones. This peated bottling has the symbol “Ansuz”, which translates as “god” or “gods”. The whisky was matured for around four years in a combination of first-fill bourbon barrels and second-fill quarter casks.

NAME: Ardbeg - Kelpie - Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This limited edition bottling was produced to celebrate Ardbeg Day at the 2017 Fèis Ìle.
This single malt from Islay is the distillery's first to use virgin oak from the Black Sea coast for maturation.  Therefore it imparts deep flavour notes that only a very small amount of whiskies have ever before.  It was then married in ex-Bourbon casks.  This dram is packed with the seaside flavours of Ardbeg and peat smoke.

NAME: Ardbeg - Drum - 2019 Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 2019 Ardbeg Drum Limited edition. The Ardbeg Drum is a non-age-statement single malt matured in ex-Bourbon casks and then finished in ex-rum casks from the Americas.  It was created to celebrate Ardbeg Day 2019 (June 1) held during the Islay Festival of Music & Malt (Fèis Ìle).
This limited-edition is bottled at 46% abv.

NAME: Glenlivet -12 Year Old (1980s)
DESCRIPTION: Bottled in the 1980s by George & J. G Smith Limited this is a 26 2/3 FL.Oz bottling of Glenlivet 12 Year Old.

NAME: Port Charlotte - MP5 Single Casks (3 x 20cl)
DESCRIPTION: This lot includes 3 x 20cl bottling of Bruichladdich's Micro Province bottlings.

NAME: Ardbeg - Perpetuum
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg Perpetuum release was in 2015 in memory of the 200th anniversary of the Islay distillery.
Perpetuum is actually a blend of old and young whisky which has been matured in both Bourbon and Sherry casks.

NAME: Macallan - Edition No.5
DESCRIPTION: The fifth release in the Edition Series from The Macallan, The Macallan Edition No. 5 celebrates The Macallan’s extensive natural colour spectrum and the intricate whisky-making process, in partnership with masters at the Pantone Color Institute™ to create a unique shade of purple that features on the packaging.

NAME: Caol Ila - 10 Year Old - Fèis Ìle 2018
DESCRIPTION:
The 2018 Fèis Ìle release from east coast legends Caol Ila was a 10 year old expression was aged in a combination of rejuvenated European oak butts and refill American hogsheads.
Bottle 387.

NAME: Ardbeg - Drum - 2019 Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 2019 Ardbeg Drum Limited edition. The Ardbeg Drum is a non-age-statement single malt matured in ex-Bourbon casks and then finished in ex-rum casks from the Americas.  It was created to celebrate Ardbeg Day 2019 (June 1) held during the Islay Festival of Music & Malt (Fèis Ìle).
This limited-edition is bottled at 46% abv.

NAME: Trinidad Rum - High Spirits Collection - 18 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This bottle of  Trinidad 18 Year Old rum was distilled at Caroni Distillery which is now closed in 1998 and bottled in 2016 by High Spirits.

NAME: Macallan - Edition No.5
DESCRIPTION: The fifth release in the Edition Series from The Macallan, The Macallan Edition No. 5 celebrates The Macallan’s extensive natural colour spectrum and the intricate whisky-making process, in partnership with masters at the Pantone Color Institute™ to create a unique shade of purple that features on the packaging.

NAME: Highland Park - 18 Year Old - Viking Pride - Travel Edition
DESCRIPTION:
Viking Pride by Highland Park is an 18 year old single malt.
This bottle has been bottled at its marrying strength of 46%.
For Viking Pride, Highland Parks Master Whisky Maker Gordon Motion carefully selects up to 120 casks which have matured for 18 years or longer and marries them together, the flavours slowly combine and gather depth and consistency.

NAME: Braeval - 17 Year Old - Single Cask Edition - Distillery Reserve Collection
DESCRIPTION:
This Braeval 17 Year Old single malt was released as part of the Distillery Reserve Collection. These single cask bottlings were exclusively available at Chivas Brothers distilleries.
Distilled on the 26th of March 2005, it was bottled at cask strength from a single first-fill barrel, #13913 on the 26th of March 2002.  This is one of just 276 individually numbered bottles produced.  This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 96.

NAME: Suntory - Special Reserve Book Decanter
DESCRIPTION: Distilled and blended by Suntory Limited comes this rather unusual decanter in the shape of a book.

NAME: Macallan - Classic Cut - 2019
DESCRIPTION:
The Macallan Classic Cut - 2019 edition is the second release in the limited annual series.  It was matured exclusively in hand-picked oloroso sherry oak casks from Jerez, Spain, before being bottled at 52.9% ABV.
It celebrates Macallan's ongoing commitment to seek out the extraordinary and create whiskies of unique character.  This single malt offers a whisky with dominant sweetness with balanced flavours.

NAME: Highland Park - RNLI Stromness Lifeboat
DESCRIPTION:
This is a special Highland Park release, bottled to commemorate the 150th anniversary of the first RNLI lifeboat being launched at Stromness on Orkney in 1987.
To mark the bravery and dedicated service of the RNLI, Highland Park released exactly 1,867 anniversary bottles in January 2018.  Since the Severn class lifeboat stationed in Stromness is 55.9 feet long, they bottled this special edition of Highland Park at 55.9% ABV.
This is one of 1,867 bottles.

NAME: Kilkerran - 8 Year Old Sherry Cask Strength 57.1%
DESCRIPTION:
Matured for 8 years in a first fill sherry cask...the colour says it all really! Beautiful. 
Kilkerran is derived from the gaelic "Caen Loch Cille Chiarain" which is the name of the original settlement where Saint Kieran had his religious cell.

NAME: Longrow - Red - 13 Year Old - 2020 Release
DESCRIPTION: This 13-year-old Longrow Red, is a limited edition from Springbank Distillery in Campbeltown. This was matured for 10 years in a mixture of bourbon barrels and refill sherry hogshead followed by 3 years in Chilean Cabernet Sauvignon barrels. There is only 9000 bottles of this Longrow Red cask strength.

NAME: Highland Park - 14 Year Old - Sweden - Ltd Edition 2018: 1 Single Cask #6147
DESCRIPTION:
Part of the Single Cask Series for SWEDEN Ltd Edition 2018: 1 limited to 575 bottles.
Matured in a 1st fill European Oak Sherry Butt cask #6147.  Distilled in 2003 and bottled in 2018.
Cask Number 6147.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask #2115 - Highland Park Appreciation Society
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Highland Park Appreciation Society.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 13 years in refill butt #2115 at the cask strength of 59.1% ABV.  With only 576 bottles available, this is an extremely limited edition.

NAME: Balblair - 1999 Vintage Bottled 2017 3rd Release
DESCRIPTION:
One of the not only the Highland distilleries but all of Scotlands distilleries, Balblair is owned by Inverhouse. 
Moving with the times, Balblair has also changed from oil to gas to reduce its carbon footprint. 
This is, of course, the travel retail version. It was distilled in 1999 and bottled in 2017.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask Series - Taiwan Duty Free #5685
DESCRIPTION: This 13 Year Old Highland Park was bottled as a Taiwan Duty-Free Exclusive release.  It is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series.  Distilled in 2004, the single malt was matured in refill butt #5685 for 13 years and was bottled in 2018 at 65.7% ABV.  This a limited release of just 531 bottles.

NAME: Tullibardine - 10 Year Old Pure Malt 1980s
DESCRIPTION:
Built in 1949, this distillery can be found in the Perthshire region of Scotland. Picard Vins & Spiritueux now own this distillery which was previously owned by Whyte and Mackay.
This 10 year is certainly an older bottling believed to be from the 1980s.

NAME: Highland Park - 15 Year Old Sweden 2003 Single Cask #4462
DESCRIPTION:
Part of the Single Cask Series for SWEDEN Ltd Edition 2018: 2 limited to 600 bottles.
Matured in a 1st fill European Oak Sherry Puncheon cask #4462.  Distilled in 2003 and bottled in 2018.
Cask Number 4462.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old #6353 2004 Germany
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park is known for being the most Northern Scotch Whisky Distillery in the world. It is situated on the outskirts of the biggest town in Orkney 58.9847°N. It is so far North it is almost in the Arctic circle. To give you an idea, it is on the same latitude as Anchorage, Alaska.
The distillery has been distilling in the same site since 1798 where the founder, Magnus Eunson’s, original illicit still was at High Park.
They smoke their own barley from over 4,000 year old peat which has been cut from the Hobbister Moor only seven miles from the distillery.
Highland Park 13 Year Old is part of the single cask series by the Island Distillery.
Matured in a 1st fill American Sherry Hogshead and bottled in 2017.
Distilled in 2002 this release was limited to 588 bottles exclusively produced for GERMANY.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask Series Germany #4250
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park is known for being the most Northern Scotch Whisky Distillery in the world. It is situated on the outskirts of the biggest town in Orkney 58.9847°N. It is so far North it is almost in the Arctic circle. To give you an idea, it is on the same latitude as Anchorage, Alaska.
The distillery has been distilling in the same site since 1798 where the founder, Magnus Eunson’s, original illicit still was at High Park.
They smoke their own barley from over 4,000 year old peat which has been cut from the Hobbister Moor only seven miles from the distillery.
Highland Park 12 Year Old is part of the single cask series by the Island Distillery.
Matured in a Refill Hogshead and bottled in 2017.
Distilled in 2005 this released was limited to 624 bottles exclusively produced for GERMANY.

NAME: Wolfburn - Raidho - Raidho -  Kylver Series - 5th Release
DESCRIPTION:
Raidho is the 5th release in the Kylver series released in 2019. The spirit was double distilled and then laid down to mature for an undisclosed length of time before being bottled free from artificial colouring. 
The Kylver series follows the Viking runic alphabet engraved on a large stone excavated in Gotland (Sweden) in 1903.  
Wolfburn Distillery is located in Thurso, making it the Northernmost distillery on the UK mainland.  Based around a long lost distillery that ended around 1850, this new Wolfburn reopened in 2013.

NAME: Highland Park - 14 Year Old Single Cask #3429 - Viking Line Batch #2
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park is known for being the most Northern Scotch Whisky Distillery in the world. It is situated on the outskirts of the biggest town in Orkney 58.9847°N. It is so far North it is almost in the Arctic circle. To give you an idea, it is on the same latitude as Anchorage, Alaska.
The distillery has been distilling in the same site since 1798 where the founder, Magnus Eunson’s, original illicit still was at High Park.
They smoke their own barley from over 4,000 year old peat which has been cut from the Hobbister Moor only seven miles from the distillery.
This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Viking Line. This release is part of batch 2. Distilled in 2002, this single malt was matured for 14 years in a refill hogshead #3429 and bottled at the cask strength of 54.7% ABV in 2017.  With only 258 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Macallan - Classic Cut - 2018
DESCRIPTION:
The Macallan Classic Cut - 2018 edition is the second release in the limited annual series.  It was matured exclusively in hand-picked oloroso sherry oak casks from Jerez, Spain, before being bottled at 51.2% ABV.
It celebrates Macallan's ongoing commitment to seek out the extraordinary and create whiskies of unique character.  This single malt offers a whisky with dominant sweetness with balanced flavours.

NAME: Scapa - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A long discontinued 12 Year Old from the Scapa Distillery in Orkney.  It was matured for 12 years in clifftop warehouses overlooking the beautiful waters of the Scapa Flow.

NAME: Ardbeg - Drum - 2019 Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 2019 Ardbeg Drum Limited edition. The Ardbeg Drum is a non-age-statement single malt matured in ex-Bourbon casks and then finished in ex-rum casks from the Americas.  It was created to celebrate Ardbeg Day 2019 (June 1) held during the Islay Festival of Music & Malt (Fèis Ìle).
This limited-edition is bottled at 46% abv.

NAME: Ardbeg - Drum - 2019 Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 2019 Ardbeg Drum Limited edition. The Ardbeg Drum is a non-age-statement single malt matured in ex-Bourbon casks and then finished in ex-rum casks from the Americas.  It was created to celebrate Ardbeg Day 2019 (June 1) held during the Islay Festival of Music & Malt (Fèis Ìle).
This limited-edition is bottled at 46% abv.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 10 Year Old - 2006 Cask Exploration #16
DESCRIPTION: A Port Charlotte 2006 vintage matured for 10 years in Banyuls cask #2170. Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 16. One of 428 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.

NAME: Blanton’s - Single Barrel Bourbon Original #101 93Proof
DESCRIPTION:
Without chill-filtration or additional colouring, this bottling was drawn from a single bourbon barrel.
Blanton's are known for their top-quality bourbon and this bottling is no different.  
Blanton's Single Bourbon is normally 6 to 8 year old bourbon, aged in Warehouse H at Buffalo Trace in the metal-clad warehouse at the distillery. The metal, transfers heat quicker than brick warehouses, allowing for faster ageing.
This comes from barrel number 101 and stored at rick 6.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 10 Year Old - 2004 Cask Exploration #04
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2004 vintage matured for 10 years in cadiz cask #1248. Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 04 Sraid A'Chladaich. One of 414 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 7.

NAME: Clynelish - 12 Year Old Friends of the Classic Malts 2009
DESCRIPTION:
Bottled especially for the Diageo "Friends Of The Classic Malts," range. It was  distilled at Clynelish before being bottled in 2009.
A 12 year old expression.

NAME: Bladnoch - 10 Year Old Flora and Fauna
DESCRIPTION:
In the 1990's Diageo created the Flora and Fauna series. Some bottles are, as usual, harder to come by than others. As it only operated from 1974 until 1993 there is only a very small number of bottlings of their spirit available.
This distillery is the most southerly in Scotland and was founded in the early 1800s. Its Lowland nature produces the most amazing whisky with delicate fruity and lemony aromas. 
Aged 10 years.

NAME: Ardbeg - Alligator - 5cl Mini
DESCRIPTION:
An alligator skin is one that looks cracked and full of scars that would have been caused during a heated battle. Well, that exactly where the name of this whisky comes from. When heat is applied to the inside of a cask, the wood begins to crack...'alligator char'.
This is the un-tammed release which came after the committee release in 2012.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 9 Year Old - 2006 Cask Exploration #09
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2006 vintage matured for 9 years in viognier cask #2175. Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 09 Fad-Moine. One of 430 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 159.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 12 Year Old - 2003 Cask Exploration #10
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2003 vintage matured for 12 years in bourbon cask #R15/358-001. Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 10 An Tuba-Mhasgaidh. One of 328 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 328.

NAME: Dailuaine - 21 Year Old 1996 Cadenhead's
DESCRIPTION: Bottled as part of the celebrations in 2017 for Cadenhead's 175 anniversary. This Dailuaine was distilled in 1996 and is a combination of 2 bourbon hogsheads. There were 618 bottles in total produced from these 21 year old single malt casks.

NAME: Linkwood - 20 Year Old 1995 Cadenhead's
DESCRIPTION:
Distilled at the Linkwood distillery in Speyside, this is a combination of 2 hogsheads that yielded only 480 bottles.
They were bot distilled in 1995 and bottled in 2006.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 12 Year Old Valinch 38 Cask #824 Colin Tocher
DESCRIPTION:
Distilled on the 16th of June 2006, this Valinch was bottled to celebrate the work that Colin Tocher has done at the distillery over the years. He worked in the bottling hall but his talents didnt stop there...in his previous employment he was one of the most talented coppersmiths around!
This was a fresh bourbon cask #824 and it matured for 12 years before bottling. Only 341 of these bottles have been in circulation.
Isn't it special that this is bottle number 2!!

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask Series - 58 Albert Street
DESCRIPTION: This 12 year old single malt was distilled 200, matured in Refill Butt number 1791 and bottled in 2017, as part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series.  This limited edition of just 540 bottles, was released to celebrate the opening of 58 Albert Street, Kirkwall.

NAME: Glenfiddich - 19 Year Old - Age of Discovery - Bourbon Cask Reserve
DESCRIPTION: This is the third release in the Glenfiddich's Travel Retail Age of Discovery series. This is a 19-year-old single malt Scotch whisky has been matured in oak casks that originally held Bourbon. Produced in honour of the Portuguese explorers of the 15th century.

NAME: Blanton's - Special Reserve Barrel #129
DESCRIPTION:
Blanton's Single Barrel Special Reserve is a lower strength single barrel bourbon.  Dumped Date. Each bottle is hand-filled, hand-labelled, hand-sealed and individually numbered. 80 Proof.
This bottling has come from rick 35.

NAME: Blanton's - Special Reserve Barrel #129
DESCRIPTION:
Blanton's Single Barrel Special Reserve is a lower strength single barrel bourbon.  Dumped Date. Each bottle is hand-filled, hand-labelled, hand-sealed and individually numbered. 80 Proof.
This bottling has come from rick 35.  
Bottle 138.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask Series - London Gatwick and World Duty Free
DESCRIPTION:
This Highland Park 12 Year Old was distilled in 2005 and bottled from a single refill butt #1140 in 2017 exclusively for London Gatwick and World Duty Free.
This is one of 540 bottles released as part of the Highland Park Single Cask Series.

NAME: Macallan - Aera
DESCRIPTION: Released in 2018 for the Taiwanese market, Macallan Aera was matured in seasoned sherry casks and features lots of dried fruit flavours on the palate.  It was bottled at 40% ABV and as the label says, it was made with some thoughtfulness in mind.

NAME: Highland Park - 15 Year Old - Single Cask #3249 - Nor'Easter 75cl
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Northeast United States - Nor'Easter.  Distilled in 2002, this single malt was matured for 15 years in refill butt #3249 at the cask strength of 56.9% ABV.  With only 546 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Longrow - Red - 13 Year Old - 2020 Release
DESCRIPTION: This 13-year-old Longrow Red, is a limited edition from Springbank Distillery in Campbeltown. This was matured for 10 years in a mixture of bourbon barrels and refill sherry hogshead followed by 3 years in Chilean Cabernet Sauvignon barrels. There is only 9000 bottles of this Longrow Red cask strength.

NAME: Bimber - Re-Charred Oak Cask - Small Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
There is 5000 bottles in the Bimber Re-charred oak casks Batch 1 Small Batch release. It was recharred, American Oak Cask.
The batch number for this bottling is 001 which was bottled in September 2019.
 
This is bottle number #4345.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask #4267 - Munich 5 Star Airport
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Munich Airport.  Distilled in 2005, this single malt was matured for 12 years in refill butt #4267 was bottled at the cask strength of 61.9% ABV.  With only 581 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Glenfarclas - 10 Year Old SMWS 1.223 Dessert Triptych: Mushroom Sorbet + Glass
DESCRIPTION:
Founded in Edinburgh in 1983 by Phillip 'Pip' Hills comes The Scotch Malt Whisky Society. His passion for whisky started when he was travelling around the country in the 70s. After which, it took his little time to purchase his first cask with a group of friends. Many years later the syndicate was purchased by Glenmorangie PLC.
Distilled in Speyside in 2008 at the Glenfarclas distillery, this dram has been matured for 10 years in a refill ex-oloroso butt.

NAME: Macallan - Classic Cut - 2019
DESCRIPTION:
The Macallan Classic Cut - 2019 edition is the second release in the limited annual series.  It was matured exclusively in hand-picked oloroso sherry oak casks from Jerez, Spain, before being bottled at 52.9% ABV.
It celebrates Macallan's ongoing commitment to seek out the extraordinary and create whiskies of unique character.  This single malt offers a whisky with dominant sweetness with balanced flavours.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 3D - Peat Proposal
DESCRIPTION:
Released in 2004, this is the first edition in the Bruichladdich 3D range. This is a vatting of 3 different peat levels from 3 diverse cellars over 3 distinct eras, thus the name '3D'. This is one of just 12,000 bottles produced. 
 
This is bottle number 3439.

NAME: Macallan - Gold (70cl & 5cl)
DESCRIPTION:
This lot includes 1 x 70cl & 1 x 5cl.
Macallan Gold was released in late 2012 as part of a series of colour-themed bottlings introduced to replace the distillery's age-statement expressions. Produced from 9-15yo first fill and refill sherry casks, it was designed to sit between the now-defunct 10yo Sherry Oak and 10yo Fine Oak bottlings.

NAME: Bimber - Re-Charred Oak Cask - Small Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
There is 5000 bottles in the Bimber Re-charred oak casks Batch 1 Small Batch release. It was recharred, American Oak Cask.
The batch number for this bottling is 001 which was bottled in September 2019.

NAME: Kirk and Sweeney - 18 Year Old rum
DESCRIPTION:
From the Caribean nation that is best known for its beaches and golfs resorts...and now its Rum. 
This cracking 18 year old comes from an undisclosed Dominican distillery.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 14 Year Old - Elementa (1L)
DESCRIPTION: This spicy and deep Elementa celebrates Glenmornagie's skills in wood finishing, an art which brings new depths of flavour to their whisky. Matured initially in American oak bourbon casks to create smoothness and fruity notes and finished in charred oak casks, bringing forth a 14-year-old whisky of woody depth and intense spice.  Available exclusively in travel retail.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 16 Year Old - The Tribute (1L)
DESCRIPTION: Created exclusively for travel retail, 16-year-old this bottling pays homage to the lightly peated whisky of Glenmorangie’s past. Aged in American oak bourbon casks for smoothness.

NAME: Glengoyne - 18 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: Introduced in 2012, Glengoyne 18 Year Old was revamped to replace the Glengoyne 17 Year Old. This Highland single malt was matured in a mix of refill sherry casks and a generous portion of first-fill sherry casks.

NAME: Highland Park - 11 Year Old - Single Cask #2132 - The W Club
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for The W Club.  Distilled in 2006, this single malt was matured for 11 years in first fill American Sherry Oak Puncheon #2132 and was bottled at the cask strength of 67% ABV.  With only 615 bottles available, this is an extremely limited edition.

NAME: Edradour - 10 Year Old (1980s)
DESCRIPTION:
The ten-year-old Edradour is handmade and one of the last Single Malt Whiskies from a traditional farm distillery still in production today. This is an early release of Edradour 10 Year Old from the 1980s.
Edradour story is most certainly one of a kind. It is owned by a gentleman called Andrew Symington who also owns the independent bottling company Signatory. Even the Mafia, Frank Costello was a representative of the company.

NAME: Longrow Red - 11 Year Old - Pinot Noir
DESCRIPTION:
In early 2018, Springbank added another release to their incredibly popular Longrow Red series.  This Longrow Red release is 11 years old and heavily peated.  It was bottled at 53.1%, and spent 8 years in bourbon casks before completing its maturation with 3 years in Refill Pinot Noir Barriques. 
Springbank Longrow Red, is always bottled at cask strength, is released annually in small quantities and every year a different type of red wine cask is used to mature the whisky.  
This is a limited edition of only 9,000 bottles.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 9 Year Old - 2008 Cask Exploration Valinch #21
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2008 vintage matured for 9 years in first-fill bourbon barrel #3404.  Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 21 Udal Cuain.  One of 330 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 6.

NAME: Ardbeg - Alligator - 5cl Mini
DESCRIPTION:
An alligator skin is one that looks cracked and full of scars that would have been caused during a heated battle. Well, that exactly where the name of this whisky comes from. When heat is applied to the inside of a cask, the wood begins to crack...'alligator char'.
This is the un-tammed release which came after the committee release in 2012.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 10 Year Old - 2007 Cask Exploration Valinch #20
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2004 vintage matured for 10 years in first-fill Pomerol cask #2188.  Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 20 Tuim an Iar-Chuain. One of 418 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 3.

NAME: Longmorn - 14 Year Old SMWS 7.217 Joie de Vivre
DESCRIPTION:
Founded in Edinburgh in 1983 by Phillip 'Pip' Hills comes The Scotch Malt Whisky Society. His passion for whisky started when he was travelling around the country in the 70s. After which, it took his little time to purchase his first cask with a group of friends. Many years later the syndicate was purchased by Glenmorangie PLC.
This Longmorn bottling was exclusive to France and bottled by the Indy bottler SMWS. Aged for 14 years in the cask this is one of only 158 bottles.

NAME: Glen Garioch - 1999 Wine Cask Matured
DESCRIPTION: This small-batch release is an absolute gem from Glen Garioch. Matured in Chateua Lagrange barriques between 1999 and 2018.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 9 Year Old - 2007 Cask Exploration #12 - Tunn
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2007 vintage matured for 10 years in Barolo cask #1739.  Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 12 Tunn. One of 436 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 2.

NAME: Ardbeg - 5 Year Old Guaranteed Wee Beastie 2020
DESCRIPTION:
A monster of a dram! This young and intensely smokey dram is said to be so fierce it wrecks everything in its path! This is the first new single malt since 2019 Traigh Bhan 19YO.  There are lots of things in this world that cannot be explained and one is said to be the fierce bite that emerges from the peat bogs of Islay.
Both ex bourbon and Oloroso sherry butts have been used to make this special little guy and Ardbegs soon-to-retire distillery manager, Mickey Heads words describe it best: “A new permanent expression in the core range is always momentous for the Distillery, but Wee Beastie is a particularly special dram. As it’s a younger whisky, it means we’re able to get as close to the still as possible. So it’s safe to say this is a ferociously good wee nip!”
So fierce that Ardbeg had to warm all of the enthusiasts of its nature with a Red bottle top for danger...

NAME: Ardbeg - Drum - 2019 Limited Edition
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 2019 Ardbeg Drum Limited edition. The Ardbeg Drum is a non-age-statement single malt matured in ex-Bourbon casks and then finished in ex-rum casks from the Americas.  It was created to celebrate Ardbeg Day 2019 (June 1) held during the Islay Festival of Music & Malt (Fèis Ìle).
This limited-edition is bottled at 46% abv.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 12 Year Old - 2005 Cask Exploration #19 - Cuan Dorcha
DESCRIPTION: A Port Charlotte 2005 vintage matured for 12 years in Hermitage Blanc cask #1571.  Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 19 Cuan Dorcha. One of 438 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.

NAME: Ben Nevis - 10 Year Old (1980s)
DESCRIPTION:
A great distillery in one of the most beautiful parts of Scotland, Ben Nevis was built by "Long" John MacDonald in 1825.
This 70cl bottle was matured for 10 years.

NAME: Macallan - Classic Cut - 2018
DESCRIPTION:
The Macallan Classic Cut - 2018 edition is the second release in the limited annual series.  It was matured exclusively in hand-picked oloroso sherry oak casks from Jerez, Spain, before being bottled at 51.2% ABV.
It celebrates Macallan's ongoing commitment to seek out the extraordinary and create whiskies of unique character.  This single malt offers a whisky with dominant sweetness with balanced flavours.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 11 Year Old - 2005 Cask Exploration #14
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2005 vintage matured for 11 years in Sherry Butt #1653. Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 14 Taigh-Bathair Bannaichte. One of 896 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 98.

NAME: Ardbeg - Ardbeg Day Feis Ile 2012 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg always has an annual Feis Ile bottling and this little beauty was released on 1st June 2012.
12,000 were produced and married in ex refill sherry casks.
Available at the distillery and online to committee members.
This is a 5cl bottling.

NAME: Blanton’s - Single Barrel Bourbon Original #101 93Proof
DESCRIPTION:
Without chill-filtration or additional colouring, this bottling was drawn from a single bourbon barrel.
Blanton's are known for their top-quality bourbon and this bottling is no different.  
Blanton's Single Bourbon is normally 6 to 8 year old bourbon, aged in Warehouse H at Buffalo Trace in the metal-clad warehouse at the distillery. The metal, transfers heat quicker than brick warehouses, allowing for faster ageing.
This comes from barrel number 101 and stored at rick 6.

NAME: Bimber - Re-Charred Oak Cask - Small Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
This Bimber Re-charred oak bottling is from Batch 1 of Bimber small-batch releases.  Matured in re-charred, American Oak Casks,  this is one of just 5000 bottles produced at 51.9%.
This is bottle number 3292.

NAME: Bimber - Re-Charred Oak Cask - Small Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
This Bimber Re-charred oak bottling is from Batch 1 of Bimber small-batch releases.  Matured in re-charred, American Oak Casks,  this is one of just 5000 bottles produced at 51.9%.
This is bottle number 3302.

NAME: Bimber - Re-Charred Oak Cask - Small Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
This Bimber Re-charred oak bottling is from Batch 1 of Bimber small-batch releases.  Matured in re-charred, American Oak Casks,  this is one of just 5000 bottles produced at 51.9%.
This is bottle number 3298.

NAME: Ardbeg - Ardbeg Day Feis Ile 2012 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg always has an annual Feis Ile bottling and this little beauty was released on 1st June 2012.
12,000 were produced and married in ex refill sherry casks.
Available at the distillery and online to committee members.
This is a 5cl bottling.

NAME: Ardbeg - Ardbeg Day Feis Ile 2012 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg always has an annual Feis Ile bottling and this little beauty was released on 1st June 2012.
12,000 were produced and married in ex refill sherry casks.
Available at the distillery and online to committee members.
This is a 5cl bottling.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 10 Year Old 2006 #1422/2006
DESCRIPTION:
A private cask bottling from the Islay progressive distillers. It was distilled in 2006 and bottled after maturing nicely in a sherry cask #1422/2006. 
This has been bottled by Whisky Broker.
Bottle 212 of 300.

NAME: Wolfburn - Kylver Series Limited Edition-  3rd Release
DESCRIPTION:
Still clinching onto the title of the most Northern distillery on the mainland UK, Wolfburn has exploded back into the whisky scene in 2013. 
This series "Kylver" is named after an ancient burial stone. This third release is possibly the most anticipated yet and means thorn or grant. 
It has been matured in a combination of ex-bourbon barrels and hogsheads before being bottled in 2017.
Label: A commissioned Thurisaz in Repose by Ian Giles.

NAME: Highland Park - Ingvar
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park Ingvar is a cask strength special edition that is part of Highland Park's Viking Warrior Series.  It was released exclusively for Taiwan Duty-Free.
Ingvar Ragnarsson was a warrior king known for his exceptional cruelty, strength and skill with many weapons.

NAME: Glenmorangie - Milsean
DESCRIPTION:
Milsean was the seventh release in Glenmorangie's Private Edition series. It was finished for two-and-a-half years in 154 toasted ex-Portuguese-red-wine barriques. This highland malt is sweet with notes of tropical fruit and lemon sherbet, backed up with some ginger spice.
'Milsean' is Gaelic for 'sweet things.'

NAME: Highland Park - 18 Year Old (Signed Limited Edition)
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Parks last batch of the 18 Year Old single malt before the new packaging of the 18 Year Old Viking Pride.
756 bottles were hand signed by Whisky Makers Max McFarlane and Gordon Motion.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask #6569 -  World Duty Free & Glasgow Airport
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for World Duty Free & Glasgow Airport.  Distilled in 2004, this single malt was matured for 13 years in refill butt #6569 at the cask strength of 63.5% ABV.  With only 660 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 16 Year Old - The Laddie Sixteen
DESCRIPTION: This bottling was released as a middle entry in Bruichladdich's revitalised line-up, sitting between the 10 Year Old and their 22 Year Old. This is an un-peated 16 year old from an American Oak cask.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask Series - London Gatwick and World Duty Free
DESCRIPTION:
This Highland Park 12 Year Old was distilled in 2005 and bottled from a single refill butt #1140 in 2017 exclusively for London Gatwick and World Duty Free.
This is one of 540 bottles released as part of the Highland Park Single Cask Series.

NAME: Laphroaig - 10 Year Old - Original Cask Strength Batch #011
DESCRIPTION:
This original cask strength bottling of the medicinal 10 year old from Islay's bestselling distillery, Laphroaig.  In making Laphroaig, malted barley is dried over a peat fire.  The smoke from this peat, found only on Islay, gives Laphroaig its particularly rich flavour.
This release was bottled at 58.6% in March 19.

NAME: Glen Scotia - 8 Year Old SMWS 93.134 The Right Hand of Darkness + Glass
DESCRIPTION:
Founded in Edinburgh in 1983 by Phillip 'Pip' Hills comes The Scotch Malt Whisky Society. His passion for whisky started when he was travelling around the country in the 70s. After which, it took his little time to purchase his first cask with a group of friends. Many years later the syndicate was purchased by Glenmorangie PLC.
From the Campbelltown region of Scotland, this single malt was distilled at Glen Scotia and matured for 8 years in a 1st refill ex bourbon barrel. One of only 238 bottles.

NAME: Macallan - Gold
DESCRIPTION: Macallan Gold was released in late 2012 as part of a series of colour-themed bottlings introduced to replace the distillery's age-statement expressions. Produced from 9-15yo first fill and refill sherry casks, it was designed to sit between the now-defunct 10yo Sherry Oak and 10yo Fine Oak bottlings.

NAME: Port Charlotte - PC 8 Ar Duthchas
DESCRIPTION:
Port Charlotte PC8, produced by Bruichladdich Distillery, is a heavily peated spirit.  It was the first release of heavily peated Port Charlotte and was produced in 2009 from some of the first spirits to be produced after the distillery's reopening.  The single malt was bottled at 8 years old in 2006 and was limited to 30000 bottles.
This malt is very much about the sentimental value in remembrance for the lost distillery at Port Charlotte on Islay. It closed in 1929. 
This is bottle number 780.

NAME: Laphroaig - Brodir - Port Wood Finish
DESCRIPTION: Initially launched exclusively in global travel retail, Brodir is aged initially in ex-bourbon barrels, before being finished in European oak ex-ruby port casks.

NAME: Craigellachie - 20 Year (1995) - Old Malt Cask
DESCRIPTION: This single cask Craigellachie was distilled in September 1995 and was bottled in November 2015 at 20 Years Old by Hunter Laing & Company Ltd, for their Old Malt Cask range.   This is one of 360 bottles from sherry butt #HL12112. Bottled at 50% ABV.

NAME: Scapa - 1990 - Gordon & MacPhail
DESCRIPTION: This a 1990 vintage Scapa selected, produced, matured and bottled by Gordon & MacPhail.

NAME: Highland Park - Decanter
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park is known for being the most Northern Scotch Whisky Distillery in the world. It is situated on the outskirts of the biggest town in Orkney 58.9847°N. It is so far North it is almost in the Arctic circle. To give you an idea, it is on the same latitude as Anchorage, Alaska.
The distillery has been distilling in the same site since 1798 where the founder, Magnus Eunson’s, original illicit still was at High Park.
They smoke their own barley from over 4,000 year old peat which has been cut from the Hobbister Moor only seven miles from the distillery.
This is a very rare find, an older decanter just that would go perfectly in any collection.

NAME: Highland Park - Single Cask Series -Taiwan Duty Free Exclusive #6311
DESCRIPTION: This 14 Yea Old Highland Park was bottled as a Taiwan Duty Free Exclusive release.  It is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series.  Distilled in 2003, the single malt was matured in refill puncheon #6311 for 14 years and was bottled in 2017 at 60.6% ABV.  This a limited release of just 510 bottles.

NAME: Highland Park - 14 Year Old - Single Cask #2118 - Edinburgh Airport and World of Whiskies
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Edinburgh Airport and World Duty Free.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 14 years in ex-sherry refill butt #2118 at a cask strength of 59.9% ABV.  With only 300 bottles available, this is an extremely limited edition.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 10 Year Old 2006 #1422/2006
DESCRIPTION:
A private cask bottling from the Islay progressive distillers. It was distilled in 2006 and bottled after maturing nicely in a sherry cask #1422/2006. 
This has been bottled by Whisky Broker.
Bottle 221.

NAME: Tomatin - 1990 Vintage Beinn A'Cheo
DESCRIPTION: Bottled by the indy bottler Beinn A'Cheo, this single malt comes from the Highland distillery Tomatin. Distilled in 1990 and bottled in 2003 thus matured for around 13 years. It was bottled at cask strength 55.8%.

NAME: Ardbeg - 5 Year Old Guaranteed Wee Beastie 2020
DESCRIPTION:
A monster of a dram! This young and intensely smokey dram is said to be so fierce it wrecks everything in its path! This is the first new single malt since 2019 Traigh Bhan 19YO.  There are lots of things in this world that cannot be explained and one is said to be the fierce bite that emerges from the peat bogs of Islay.
Both ex bourbon and Oloroso sherry butts have been used to make this special little guy and Ardbegs soon-to-retire distillery manager, Mickey Heads words describe it best: “A new permanent expression in the core range is always momentous for the Distillery, but Wee Beastie is a particularly special dram. As it’s a younger whisky, it means we’re able to get as close to the still as possible. So it’s safe to say this is a ferociously good wee nip!”
So fierce that Ardbeg had to warm all of the enthusiasts of its nature with a Red bottle top for danger...

NAME: Kininvie - 17 Year Old Batch #001 35cl
DESCRIPTION:
Kininvie 1996 17 Year Old Batch #001 35cl
Owned by William Grant & Sons this malt is somewhat mysterious. 
A travel retail exclusive which was matured in both European Sherry and American Oak Casks.

NAME: Bimber - Ex-bourbon - Small Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
One of only 1948 bottles in the Bimber Ex-bourbon Batch 1 Small Batch release. It was firstly matured in 1st fill bourbon barrels. 
The batch number for this bottling is 01/2020 which was bottled in May 2020. 
 
Bottle 1327.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask Series - London Gatwick and World Duty Free
DESCRIPTION:
This Highland Park 12 Year Old was distilled in 2005 and bottled from a single refill butt #1140 in 2017 exclusively for London Gatwick and World Duty Free.
This is one of 540 bottles released as part of the Highland Park Single Cask Series.

NAME: Highland Park - 14 Year Old - Single Cask #3824 - Cinderella Whisky Fair 10th Anniversary
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Cinderella Whisky Fair 10th Anniversary.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 14 years in 1st fill American Sherry Oak cask #3824 at a cask strength of 59% ABV.  With only 594 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 16 Year Old - Bourbon Cask
DESCRIPTION: Since prohibition, surplus Bourbon casks are the predominant wood for maturing Scotch. This 16-Year-Old Bruichladdich has been matured in Jim Beam casks with additional cask evolution in fresh American oak from Buffalo Trace. An American Classic – Bruichladdich in white oak.  This bottling was launched to commemorate the 75th anniversary since US Prohibition was abolished.

NAME: Bimber - Ex-bourbon - Small Batch #1
DESCRIPTION:
One of only 1948 bottles in the Bimber Ex-bourbon Batch 1 Small Batch release. It was firstly matured in 1st fill bourbon barrels. 
The batch number for this bottling is 01/2020 which was bottled in May 2020. 
 
Bottle 1516.

NAME: Highland Park - 13 Year Old - Single Cask #6324 - Sisu
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Sisu.  Distilled in 2003, this single malt was matured for 13 years in Refill puncheon #6324 at the cask strength of 60.2% ABV.  With only 390 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: MacDonald's - Glencoe 8 Year Old 100Proof 1970s
DESCRIPTION:
Bottled at 100 Proof, this blended malt has been aged for at least 8 years. 
It is from the 1970s and has a crest of Buchaillie Etive Mor of the front label. This mountain is part of Scotlands mountain group called the Munros, this is any mountain over 3000 feet. There are a few other stipulations...but you get the gist of it!

NAME: Dalmore - 13 Year Old - #702099 - Whisky Broker
DESCRIPTION:
This single cask bottling by Whisky Broker is a Apil 2007 vinatge 13 Year Old Dalmore.  Matured in cask #702099, then split into 4 small Oloroso octaves in 30th January 2019. It was then bottled in 29th June 2020 at 54.7%. This is one of 216 bottles.
 
This is bottle number 55

NAME: Highland Park - 18 Year Old - Viking Pride
DESCRIPTION:
Viking Pride by Highland Park is an 18 year old single malt.
This bottle has been bottled at its marrying strength of 46%.
For Viking Pride, Highland Parks Master Whisky Maker Gordon Motion carefully selects up to 120 casks which have matured for 18 years or longer and marries them together, the flavours slowly combine and gather depth and consistency.

NAME: Highland Park - 14 Year Old - 2005 Single Cask Independent Whisky Bars of Scotland Cask #2390
DESCRIPTION: A 14 year old single cask Highland Park bottled for the Independent Whisky Bars of Scotland in 2019.  It was from cask no. 2390 which was a 1st fill American Sherry Oak puncheon.  This is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and is one of 657 Bottles.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 11 Year Old - 2005 Cask Exploration Valinch #15
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2005 vintage matured for 11 years in Fresh Bourbon cask #1905.  Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 15 Barcadh Nan Tonn.  One of 288 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 99.

NAME: Highland Park - Single Cask #6204 - Runa (25th Anniversary)
DESCRIPTION: This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for the 25th Anniversary of Runa. Distilled in 2004, this single malt was matured for 13 years in refill butt #6204 and bottled aat the cask strength of 62% ABV.  With only 618 bottles available, this is a limited edition.

NAME: Glenfarclas - 21 Years Old - Independent Whisky Bars of Scotland
DESCRIPTION:
Glenfarclas 21 Year Old is one of the most iconic Speyside drams - it is seen as a classic by many. It is heavily sherried dram, rich and full-bodied making it rank right up there with the best of Speyside malts.
This release of Glenfarclas 21 Year old for the Independent Whisky Bars of Scotland was bottled at 47.9%, opposed to 43% that the 21 Year Old is typically bottled at. This is one of 227 individually numbered bottles released.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 9 Year Old - 2006 Cask Exploration #07
DESCRIPTION:
A Port Charlotte 2006 vintage matured for 9 years in Rivesaltes cask #1653. Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 07 Eolas An Deididh. One of 393 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.
This is bottle number 174.

NAME: That Boutique-y Rum Company - 3 Year Old - O Reizinho - Batch 1
DESCRIPTION:
This is the second bottling of rum produced by Portugal's O Reizinho from That Boutique-y Rum Company. This is a 3-year-old expression, Batch 1 is a release of 1,936 bottles.
This is bottle number 1493.

NAME: Dalmore - 13 Year Old - #702099 - Whisky Broker
DESCRIPTION:
This single cask bottling by Whisky Broker is a Apil 2007 vinatge 13 Year Old Dalmore.  Matured in cask #702099, then split into 4 small Oloroso octaves in 30th January 2019. It was then bottled in July 2019 at 54.7%. This is one of 216 bottles.
 
 This is bottle 116.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 9 Year Old - 2008 Cask Exploration #17
DESCRIPTION: A Port Charlotte 2008 vintage matured for 9 years in Premier Cru Claret #3481. Part of the Cask Exploration range, this is edition 17 Foghar an Eorna. One of 360 individually numbered bottles, this is a limited edition from Bruichladdich Distillery. This is a 50cl bottling.

NAME: Lagavulin - 16 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
This is a popular and much sought-after single malt with the massive peat-smoke that's typical of southern Islay - but also offering richness and a dryness that turns it into a truly interesting tipple. The 16 year old, aged in oak casks has truly become a benchmark Islay dram from the Lagavulin distillery.
This whisky was The Runner Up in TWE's Whisky of the Year 2014 & 2015 Silver Outstanding Medal Winner - International Wine & Spirits Competition amongst other accolades.

NAME: Macallan - 15 Year old - Fine Oak
DESCRIPTION: This 15 year old single malt is part of Macallan's Fine Oak, triple cask matured range.  It has been matured for fifteen years in three oak cask types; Europen oak seasoned with sherry, American oak seasoned with sherry and American oak seasoned with bourbon.  It is 'a rich straw whisky' with notes of cinnamon, rich chocolate and dried fruits.  This bottle is an import.

NAME: That Boutique-y Whisky Company - 26 Year Old Blend #1 Batch #4
DESCRIPTION:
That Boutique-y Whisky Company, bottles all manner of incredible whiskies from top distilleries and brands from around the world.
This is batch 4 of their blended series. Only 322 bottles were produced.

NAME: Tomatin - 16 Year Old #6925 1988
DESCRIPTION:
Bladnoch distillery forum is a great great concept created by Raymond Armstrong. When he bought over Bladnoch distillery he started an online forum to keep his friends and single malt enthusiasts up to date and informed about how the distillery was progressing. 
In 2005 they started to bottle singke casks which is where this lovely Tomatin comes in. It has been aged for 16 years in cask #6925 which was distilled in 1988.

NAME: Glengoyne - Cask Strength - Batch #1
DESCRIPTION: This is the very first edition of Glengoyne Cask Strength that was first released in 2012. A combination of first-fill sherry-matured whisky and refill-matured malt resulted in a very flavourful bottling. Bottled at the cask strength of 58.7%.

NAME: Wolfburn - Lest We Forget - poppyscotland
DESCRIPTION:
A limited edition from Wolfburn Distillery to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the end of The First World War.  A total of 1918 bottles were produced and sold exclusively from the distillery and through the Carnegie Whisky Cellars in Dornoch.  This project is important to both companies and was proposed to Wolfburn Distillery due to the owners of Wolfburn being former British Servicemen and the importance of the Poppy Appeal to all service personnel and their families.
It's a lightly peated single malt, featuring a small portion of the whisky drawn from sherry casks, and has been bottled at 46% ABV.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 7 Year Old MRC:01 2010
DESCRIPTION:
This distillery is now closed but the name remains. It comes from Bruichladdich and is produced exclusively with Scottish barley.
50% matured in first-fill American bourbon, while the remaining 50% was matured in second-fill French wine casks.
After this, the two whiskies were combined for a year in Bordeaux wine casks.

NAME: Clynelish - 8 Year Old SMWS 26.143 Candles and Candles + Glass
DESCRIPTION:
Founded in Edinburgh in 1983 by Phillip 'Pip' Hills comes The Scotch Malt Whisky Society. His passion for whisky started when he was travelling around the country in the 70s. After which, it took his little time to purchase his first cask with a group of friends. Many years later the syndicate was purchased by Glenmorangie PLC.
This Highland single malt has been matured for 8 years after being distilled at Clynelish distillery on the 19th of Sept 2011. 
It was a 2nd fill ex-bourbon barrel.

NAME: Longmorn - 14 Year Old SMWS 7.217 Joie de Vivre + Glass
DESCRIPTION:
Founded in Edinburgh in 1983 by Phillip 'Pip' Hills comes The Scotch Malt Whisky Society. His passion for whisky started when he was travelling around the country in the 70s. After which, it took his little time to purchase his first cask with a group of friends. Many years later the syndicate was purchased by Glenmorangie PLC.
This Longmorn bottling was exclusive to France and bottled by the Indy bottler SMWS. Aged for 14 years in the cask this is one of only 158 bottles.

NAME: Dalmore - 12 Year Old - Old Style - 1L
DESCRIPTION:
This Dalmore 12 year old, is one of the older style bottlings.  This presentation of the Dalmore 12 is no longer available from the distillery. 
Dalmore 12 is aged for 9 years in American white oak ex-bourbon casks, then in ex-oloroso sherry casks for the final three years. The result is a whisky with a combination of sweetness and rich, sherried flavours.
"With its intricate aromas and flavours, The Dalmore 12 is recognised as a whisky with character far beyond its age" - Richard Patterson.
Using water from the river Alness the Dalmore distillery has produced some really majestic whisky since 1839.

NAME: Glenfiddich - 125th Anniversary Edition
DESCRIPTION: Originally a travel retail exclusive released in 2012, this special bottling celebrates the 125th anniversary of Glenfiddich's opening, with spirit running from the stills on Christmas day 1887.

NAME: Laphroaig - Cairdeas - Cask Strength Quarter Cask 2017
DESCRIPTION:
Cairdeas, Gaelic for 'friendship', is an annual bottle release by Laphroaig for their Friends of Laphroaig members. 
This 2017 bottling is a cask strength, Quarter cask American Oak matured single malt. The smaller casks give greater contact with the wood and a more intense maturation.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 15 Year Old -  Fifteen
DESCRIPTION:
An older version of this bottle the Bruichladdich 15 Year Old.
This style of bottle is becoming harder and harder to find every year.
Voted distillery of the year in 2001 by Malt Advocate and this malt took home the gold from Stockholm Whisky festival in 2001.

NAME: Highland Park - 10 Year Old - Single Cask Series Germany #140
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park is known for being the most Northern Scotch Whisky Distillery in the world. It is situated on the outskirts of the biggest town in Orkney 58.9847°N. It is so far North it is almost in the Arctic circle. To give you an idea, it is on the same latitude as Anchorage, Alaska.
The distillery has been distilling in the same site since 1798 where the founder, Magnus Eunson’s, original illicit still was at High Park.
They smoke their own barley from over 4,000 year old peat which has been cut from the Hobbister Moor only seven miles from the distillery.
Highland Park 10 Year Old is part of the single cask series by the Island Distillery.
Matured in a 1st Fill American Oak and bottled in 2018. 
Distilled in 2008 this released was limited to 618 bottles exclusively produced for GERMANY.

NAME: Talisker - 2000 Distillers Edition
DESCRIPTION:
The Distillers Edition is a special release from Talisker, the single malt was double matured with a finishing period in a sweet amoroso cask-wood. 
The limited-edition bottle was distilled in 2000 and bottled at 45.8%.
The Distillers Edition Series features a small number of casks from 6 distilleries that were hand-selected for double maturing.

NAME: Talisker - 10 Year Old - 1990s
DESCRIPTION:
From the Isle of Skye Talisker 10 Year Old from the 1990s.This older style of the packaging features the Isle of Skye mapped on a stone. 
Talisker was originally formed in 1930 by Kenneth and Hugh Macaskill.   The two gentlemen are in fact brothers. The fire in November 1960 resulted in a new distillery being built which included two new stills. Now part of Diagio classic malt line up, a great one for island collectors and lovers of the Isle of Skye.

NAME: Mackmyra - Efva Swedish Single Malt
DESCRIPTION:
This is one of only 4111 bottles and is from Mackmyra Efva.
It is part of the distillery's 'Moment' series and has been matured in Oloroso and birch sap wine casks.
It is special because the casks were selected by Efva Attling who is a Swedish jewellery designer.

NAME: Bowmore - 18 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
Produced from the unspoiled land of Islay, this beautiful malt has been aged for 18 years in the famous Vaults. Bowmore is in the heart of the island and on the shore of Loch Indaal.
Regarded as one of the most balanced whiskies in the world, this expression has a wonderfully creamy nose with a complex palate.

NAME: Macallan - Classic Cut - 2019
DESCRIPTION:
The Macallan Classic Cut - 2019 edition is the second release in the limited annual series.  It was matured exclusively in hand-picked oloroso sherry oak casks from Jerez, Spain, before being bottled at 52.9% ABV.
It celebrates Macallan's ongoing commitment to seek out the extraordinary and create whiskies of unique character.  This single malt offers a whisky with dominant sweetness with balanced flavours.

NAME: Dalmore - 13 Year Old - #702099 - Whisky Broker
DESCRIPTION:
This single cask bottling by Whisky Broker is a Apil 2007 vinatge 13 Year Old Dalmore.  Matured in cask #702099, then split into 4 small Oloroso octaves in 30th January 2019. It was then bottled in 29th June 2020 at 54.7%. This is one of 216 bottles.
 
Bottle 56.

NAME: Black Friday -18 Year Old - 2018 - The Whisky Exchange
DESCRIPTION:
This limited release of Highland Park, or to be more politically correct..."Orkney Single Malt" from Elixir Distillers.
1400 bottles were released at general sale to celebrate Black Friday.
This expression was bottled in October of 2018.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Years Old - Single Cask Series Aberdeen Airport #3631
DESCRIPTION: This Highland Park Single Cask Edition was bottled in 2018 exclusively for Aberdeen International Airport and World of Whiskies.  With just 610 bottles available, the 12-year-old single malt whisky is drawn from an intriguing mix of American/Spanish oak cask and bottled at a cask strength 64.4% ABV.

NAME: Glengoyne - Cask Strength - Batch #1
DESCRIPTION: This is the very first edition of Glengoyne Cask Strength that was first released in 2012. A combination of first-fill sherry-matured whisky and refill-matured malt resulted in a very flavourful bottling. Bottled at the cask strength of 58.7%.

NAME: Chivas - Royal Salute - 21 Year Old - Ruby Flagon
DESCRIPTION: This is a special Ruby-coloured edition of Chivas' Royal Salute 21 Year Old blended whisky.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 12 Year Old - Millennium Malt
DESCRIPTION:
A special bottling of Glenmorangie to commemorate our progression into the 21st century, this is made up of only whisky from first fill casks, giving a more fuller flavoured whisky than the regular 12 year old. Highly rated and increasingly rare.
This malt was highly rated by both Michael Jackson and Jim Murray in their tasting for The Whisky Magazine.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Single Cask #4809 - Whisky Brother
DESCRIPTION:
This bottling is part of Highland Park's Single Cask Series and was bottled exclusively for Whisky Brother.  Distilled in 2005, this single malt was matured for 12 years in 1st Fill American Sherry Oak Puncheon #4809 and was bottled at a cask strength of 65.8% ABV.  With only 584 bottles available, this is an extremely limited edition.
This is a 75cl bottling.

NAME: Longmorn - 15 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This discontinued Longmorn was bottled after being matured in oak casks for 15 years in the heart of the Scottish Highands.

NAME: Macallan - Gold - Limited Edition (Ernie Button)
DESCRIPTION: Macallan Gold in a beautiful presentation box complete with an Oak stopper. Ernie Button is a photographer that has started to work with Macallan a lot due to their similar nature in style.

NAME: Tomatin - 21 Year Old - Batch 1 - That Boutique-y Whisky Company
DESCRIPTION:
That Boutique-y Whisky Company, bottles all manner of incredible whiskies from top distilleries and brands from around the world.
The first independent bottling of Tomatin single malt Scotch whisky from That Boutique-y Whisky Company is a caramel-rich 21 year old expression
This bottle is from batch 1 and is one of 304 individually numbered bottles. 
This is bottle number 179.

NAME: Macallan - 12 Year Old - Fine Oak - Ernie Button
DESCRIPTION:
This limited edition 12 year old single malt is part of Macallan's Fine Oak, triple cask matured range.  This special bottling comes in a limited edition box showcasing work of photographer Ernie Button.
The single malt has been matured for twelve years in three oak cask types; Europen oak seasoned with sherry, American oak seasoned with sherry and American oak seasoned with bourbon.  The Macallan Fine Oak 12 Year Old is medium-bodied and balanced with fruit, oak and spice.

NAME: Caol Ila - 18 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is said to be a balanced 18 Year Old - time has tamed the peatiness, with the raw Islay character being tempered by a robust oak influence.

NAME: Arran - 15 Year Old Dragons Dram Private Cask #1115
DESCRIPTION:
Only 258 bottles of this wonderfully dark single malt were produced from the Arran distillery. The dragon's dram is the second in a series of distillery exclusive bottlings. Each cask has been chosen via a blind tasting by one of the many characters either working in the distillery or the visitor centre at LochRanza. 
This is a sherry hogshead that was distilled in 1998 and bottled on the 8th of November 2013. Only 258 bottles were produced from cask 1998/1115.
Bottle number 167.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - 12 Year Old - Black Label - Collectors Edition
DESCRIPTION:
Johnnie Walker Black Label's iconic square bottle makes it one of the world's most recognisable whiskies.  It is a blend of around 40 whiskies. This is the special Collectors edition.
Bottle number 008625.

NAME: Auchroisk - 15 Year Old (2002) - Old Malt Cask
DESCRIPTION: This Auchrosik was distilled in October 2002 and bottled 17 years later in January 2018 at 50%, by Hunter Laing for The Old Malt Cask range. This is one of only 341 bottles charged from refill hogshead #14652.

NAME: Highland Park - Full Volume
DESCRIPTION: Full Volume by Highland Park was distilled in 1999 and bottled in 2017 from 481 casks.  The single malt was matured exclusively in first-fill bourbon casks and was bottled at 47.2% ABV and comes presented in a themed presentation box resembling speaker.

NAME: Glen Scotia - 10 Year Old SMWS 93.129 For sharing with good company.
DESCRIPTION:
Glen Scotia produces some of the finest single malts in Scotland. It was founded in 1832 down in Campbeltown.
Founded in Edinburgh in 1983 by Phillip 'Pip' Hills comes The Scotch Malt Whisky Society. His passion for whisky started when he was travelling around the country in the 70s. After which, it took his little time to purchase his first cask with a group of friends. Many years later the syndicate was purchased by Glenmorangie PLC.
This is the 2020 release for the Campletown malts festival and is one of 225 bottles. Bottled at 10 years old.

NAME: Kilchoman - 100% Islay - 4th Edition (Signed)
DESCRIPTION:
This is the 4th edition of Kilchoman's very popular 100% Islay series. This is a lightly peated single malt Scotch whisky (even compared with their Machir Bay and Loch Gorm), made with barley which was grown on Islay.  To create this release, they used a combination of four and five-year-old whiskies from first-fill bourbon barrels (40 in total) and bottled it without chill-filtration or added colouring.
This bottling has been signed.

NAME: Dalmore - 15 Year Old - Gift Set
DESCRIPTION:
This gist set includes a 70cl bottle of  Dalmore 15 Year Old and 2 x branded glasses in an attractive gift set.
This Dalmore 15 year old was matured for 12 years in American white oak ex-bourbon casks and then a further 3 year maturation in three different sherry casks: Amoroso, Apostoles and Matusalem Oloroso.

NAME: Old Fettercairn - 8 Year Old (1980s) 75cl
DESCRIPTION:
This 8-year-old is estimated to be a 1980s bottling.  Fettercairn, owned by Whyte and Mackay distillers, is a Highland distillery.
This is a Empresa Das Aguas import.

NAME: Tomatin - 11 Year Old 1989 Cadenhead's
DESCRIPTION:
Distilled in the Highlands of Scotland at the famous Tomatin distillery in 1989. This single malt was aged for 11 years in a bourbon Hogshead and yielded 312 bottles. 
It has been bottled by Cadenhead at cask strength of 58.1%.

NAME: Glenlivet - 18 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
A beautifully designed well-aged statement whisky from the Speyside giant.
Even Tony Soprano would tell you this is a cracking dram, it was one of his favourites. 
Glenlivet is the oldest legal distillery in Scotland.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 15 Year Old - Duke of Edinburgh
DESCRIPTION:
An older version of this bottle the Bruichladdich 15-Year-Old.  This is the second release limited edition Duke of Edinburgh bottling.  It was Finished in Chateau d'Yquem Sauternes casks. 
This is bottle number 1114.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 9 Year Old - 2009 MC:01
DESCRIPTION: A travel exclusive release by Bruichladdich's Port Charlotte. MC:01 was initially matured in American whiskey and French oak casks, before being combined and finished in casks that previously held Sicilian wine.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 2010 MRC:01
DESCRIPTION: Bottled at 59.2% MRC:01 2010 was distilled from 100% Scottish barley, from the Invernesshire region. Matured in first-fill American whiskey casks and second fill French wine casks then matured for an extra year in the finest French oak from the Bordeaux left bank.

NAME: Kilchoman - Am Bùrach
DESCRIPTION: Kilchoman's Am Bùrach - meaning "the mess" in Gaelic! Created when a Stillman mixed together some Machir Bay and Port Matured Kilchoman while vatting casks! The whisky was filled back into Bourbon barrels and eventually given a finishing period in ruby port casks creating an unintentionally tasty dram!

NAME: Port Charlotte - 7 Year Old MRC:01 2010
DESCRIPTION:
This distillery is now closed but the name remains. It comes from Bruichladdich and is produced exclusively with Scottish barley.
50% matured in first-fill American bourbon, while the remaining 50% was matured in second-fill French wine casks.
After this, the two whiskies were combined for a year in Bordeaux wine casks.

NAME: Jon, Mark and Robbo's - The Smokey Peaty One 50cl
DESCRIPTION:
A great blended malt from a selection of the Islands.
Some of the distilleires included are Caol Ila, Highland Park, Bunnahabhain, Ledaig, Bowmore and Laphroaig.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 12 Year Old - The Accord  (1L)
DESCRIPTION: This 12-year-old Glenmorangie showcases expertise in marrying casks. Matured in American oak bourbon casks and finished in oloroso sherry casks for sweetness and spice. Released for Travel retail.

NAME: Jura - 8 Year Old 1970s
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Isle of Jura Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Bottled by a very well renowned company in the 1970s, this is an older style of Jura from the late 1970s.

NAME: Glengoyne - 18 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: Introduced in 2012, Glengoyne 18 Year Old was revamped to replace the Glengoyne 17 Year Old. This Highland single malt was matured in a mix of refill sherry casks and a generous portion of first-fill sherry casks.

NAME: Glendronach - Peated Port Wood
DESCRIPTION:
A Glendronach Port Wood that has been smoked with the peat from the Scottish highlands.
Step aside Islay? Not quite yet...but well worth a try for Highland malt fans looking to dip their toe into in the water of smoke...

NAME: Tomatin - 2009 Oloroso Cask #3554 for Bi Wines & Spirits
DESCRIPTION:
Distilled in 2009 and matured in cask #3554 a first-fill oloroso sherry cask, hand selected at the distillery by Bi Wines & Spirits. Bottled in 2018, this is one of 598 bottles.
Bottle number 207.

NAME: Dufftown - Glenlivet - 8 Year Old (1980s)
DESCRIPTION:
Once one of the biggest distilleries in the world, this Speyside 8 year old malt, has spirit stills larger than its wash stills.
We estimate this bottle is from the 1980s. 
This is a 75cl bottling by Arthur Bell and Sons.

NAME: Macallan - 12 Year Old - Triple Cask
DESCRIPTION: The 12 year old single malt was matured for 12 years and drawn from a combination of European sherry seasoned casks, American sherry seasoned casks and American ex-bourbon casks.  It is part of Macallan's Triple Cask range which was launched in 2018, taking the place of the Fine Oak range.

NAME: Auchentoshan - 10 Year Old (1980s)
DESCRIPTION: This is an older style of 10 year old Lowland single malt distilled at Auchentoshan was bottled in the 1980s. It was triple-distilled and aged in oak casks. This is a 75cl bottling.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 18 Year Old - Extremely Rare
DESCRIPTION:
This bottle is an 18 year old Extremely Rare, Highland single malt produced by Glenmorangie. It has been perfected by the sixteen men of Tain who have specially aged this bottle for 18 years in superior oak casks and a period in Oloroso Sherry casks.
This bottle has an expression of great depths and richness which will come from the revealing flavours of vanilla, almonds and dried fruits.

NAME: Glen Avon - 8 Year Old 1980s
DESCRIPTION:
This bottling is heavily talked about and it is said to be a single malt from Glenf...from Speyside...
This older bottling was from Avonside Whisky Ltd and has been matured for 8 years.

NAME: St Ola - 2010 8 Year Old - Orcadian Blended Malt/The Whisky Barrel
DESCRIPTION:
This blended Orcadian malt was matured in a refill sherry hogshead, this single cask of vatted malt was distilled in Kirkwall 1st April 2010 and bottled 28th August 2018 for The Whisky Barrel Ltd.
This is one of only 82 bottles produced.

NAME: Macallan - 12 Year Old - Triple Cask Limited Edition Tin
DESCRIPTION: This Macallan 12 Year Old was Triple Cask matured in a mixture of European and American oak casks that have previously contained Sherry, as well as American oak casks which have contained Bourbon.  It comes presented in a limited edition tin.

NAME: Caol Ila - 8 Year Old - Unpeated 2008
DESCRIPTION: While whisky from the Caol Ila is usually smoky, but this yearly release looks at the distillery's other, less well-known side: unpeated spirit. The 2008 bottling was matured in refill and rejuvenated American-oak hogsheads and ex-bodega European oak butts.

NAME: Te Bheag - Nan Eilean
DESCRIPTION:
This brand has a great range of traditional Gaelic Whiskies. Tè Bheag; an exceptional connoisseurs’ blend that contains a high malt content aged in sherry casks. 
This bottling comes with its very own small quaich and is an exlusive French export.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 18 Year Old - Extremely Rare
DESCRIPTION:
This bottle is an 18 year old Extremely Rare, Highland single malt produced by Glenmorangie. It has been perfected by the sixteen men of Tain who have specially aged this bottle for 18 years in superior oak casks and a period in Oloroso Sherry casks.
This bottle has an expression of great depths and richness which will come from the revealing flavours of vanilla, almonds and dried fruits.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - 12 Year Old - Black Label - Collectors Edition
DESCRIPTION: This is a Collector's Edition decanter of Johnnie Walker Black Label. Johnnie Walker Black Label is a blend of around 40 whiskies.

NAME: Glenmorangie - Sherry Wood Finish
DESCRIPTION: After initially maturing in American Oak cask, this Glenmorangie was then allowed a special finishing period in selected sherry 'butts'.  The sherry finish has made this Glenmorangie extra special.  The wood finish range was discontinued in Summer 2007.

NAME: Glenmorangie - Bacalta
DESCRIPTION: Glenmorangie Bacalta is s a single malt that is the eight release from the Private Edition collection. Matured in ex-bourbon casks and extra matured in former malmsey maderia wine casks.

NAME: Caol Ila - 9 Year Old 2010 Cask #300755
DESCRIPTION:
Bottled from a wine barrique #300755 on the 6th May 2020, this dram is from Caol Ila and independently bottled by Whisky Broker. 
It has been bottled at natural cask strength with only 256 bottles being produced. 
This is bottle number 33.

NAME: Highland Park - 15 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A 2016 re-release of the discontinued Highland Park 15-Year-Old. Aged in sherry casks, it is said to be 'a fresh and enormously drinkable whisky' by John Hansell, Malt Advocate Magazine.

NAME: Elijah Craig - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: The name Elijah Craig adorns some of Heaven Hill Brands’ finest bourbons.  This is a 12 Year Old Straight Kentucky small-batch bourbon.

NAME: Port Charlotte - 7 Year Old MRC:01 2010
DESCRIPTION:
This distillery is now closed but the name remains. It comes from Bruichladdich and is produced exclusively with Scottish barley.
50% matured in first-fill American bourbon, while the remaining 50% was matured in second-fill French wine casks.
After this, the two whiskies were combined for a year in Bordeaux wine casks.

NAME: Tomatin - 25 Year Old - 35cl
DESCRIPTION:
One of the classics from the Highland distillery, this bottling is a 35cl. 
Located in Monadhliath mountains just south of Inverness, which is the capital of the highlands.

NAME: Macallan - 10 Year Old - Fine Oak
DESCRIPTION: This 10 year old single malt is part of Macallan's Fine Oak, triple cask matured range. It has been matured for ten years in three oak cask types; Europen oak seasoned with sherry, American oak seasoned with sherry and American oak seasoned with bourbon. This bottling has been discontinued.

NAME: Macallan - Lumina
DESCRIPTION: Lumina is part of The Macallan Quest range which was originally released for the Travel Retail market.  It features four no-age statement expressions showing off the many, many miles travelled to sources the casks to mature the Speyside whisky. The Lumina expression is made with whisky aged in sherry-seasoned European and American oak casks, as well as hogsheads. While sherry does get a good look-in with this one, it's a much more vanilla and toffee-focussed dram.

NAME: Glenfiddich - 12 Year Old - Caoran Reserve
DESCRIPTION: A 12 year old Glenfiddich with a twist - the malted barley is dried using peat to produce a more characterful, smoky flavour - its name “Caoran” is from the Gaelic for Peat Ember.  Although a resounding success since its launch, this is a discontinued bottling.

NAME: Tomatin - 1999 Temparnillo Wine Cask #29457
DESCRIPTION:
The Tomatin 1999 release is limited to just 302 bottles. Matured in a refill American Oak cask finished in a Tempranillo Wine Cask . This is a highly popular expression. This bottle was distilled on 26th September 1997 and bottled over 10 years later on 2nd November 2009 from cask #29457.
This is bottle number 289.

NAME: Douglas Laing - 21 Year Old Rock Island
DESCRIPTION:
This is not Douglas Laings first time around the black with a branded blended malt...
Big Peat (Islay) 
Scally Wag (Speyside)
They have followed a great trend and this would go under the bracket of Island whiskies including Arran, Jura, Orkney malts and Islay whiskies. 
This blend is a minimum of 21 years old.

NAME: Bruichladdich - 3D Moine Mhor - Second Edition
DESCRIPTION: Moine Mhor is Gaelic for 'big peat' - This is a vatting of 3 different peat levels from 3 diverse cellars over 3 distinct eras, thus the name '3D': Heavily peated 2001 Port Charlotte, moderately peated 1998 whisky and 1989 lightly peated Bruichladdich.  This bottling is the second edition of 3D "The Peat Proposal" but with more peat and higher strength.

NAME: Mortlach - Rare Old
DESCRIPTION:
Mortlach - Rare Old was the first available release in the Mortlach range. The  Rare Old expression has been matured in a combination of bourbon and sherry casks and balances distillery character with cask influence. This is a 50cl bottling.
The bottles for this range are designed to reflect Victorian engineering designs in a tribute to one of the key figures in Mortlach's history, George Cowie, a civil engineer.

NAME: Balvenie - 14 Year Old - Peat Week 2002
DESCRIPTION:
Matured in American Oak casks this malt was aged for 14 years.
Since 2002, the distillery has dedicated one week each year to run heavily peated barley through the whisky-making process creating a distinctly different Balvenie.

NAME: Glenfiddich - Project XX (Experiment 2) & Glass
DESCRIPTION:
This is the second release of the Glenfiddich Experimental Series. Project XX (20).  It is a vatting of 20 different Glenfiddich casks, including Port Pipes, Sherry Butts & Bourbon casks chosen by Glenfiddich's 20 global ambassadors.
The fingerprint on the bottle is a print of all 20 of the ambassadors' fingerprints.

NAME: Penderyn - Single Cask Ratafia Champenois Finish T-016
DESCRIPTION:
Distilled in Wales, this dram was finished for 18 months in a Ratafia Champenois cask. An Idny bottler of France, Gilles Dumangin selects only the finest casks. 
This bottling came to France where it was further matured and bottled.
Penderyn is one of the smallest distilleries in the world.
This is bottle number 373.

NAME: Dalwhinnie - Lizzie's Dram
DESCRIPTION: This Dalwhinnie career and retirement  the work of Lizzie Stewart, Scotland’s first female operator in Malt Distilling. Lizzie's Dram recognises her 31 years’ service at Dalwhinnie Distillery, working in the warehouse, mash house and the still house. This was a distillery exclusive bottling, released in March 2018, matured entirely in refill bourbon casks. This is one of 7,500 bottles.

NAME: Bladnoch - 8 Year Old (75cl)
DESCRIPTION: This is an old-style 8 Year Old Bladnoch 75cl bottling, estimated to be from around the 1980s distilled and bottled in Scotland by Arthur Bell & Sons plc. Very different from more recent bottlings.

NAME: Berry Bros & Rudd - Orkney Islands 2002
DESCRIPTION:
Berry Bros has a history that is pretty spectacular...it has two royal warrants and 300+ years of history. Still trading from its original base and home - No3 St James Street London. 
This is an Orkney Malt that has been aged for 14 years before bottling in 2018.

NAME: Aberlour - 11 Year Old SMWS 54.69 A bare flower in the breeze
DESCRIPTION:
Founded in Edinburgh in 1983 by Phillip 'Pip' Hills comes The Scotch Malt Whisky Society. His passion for whisky started when he was travelling around the country in the 70s. After which, it took his little time to purchase his first cask with a group of friends. Many years later the syndicate was purchased by Glenmorangie PLC.
Matured for 11 years in a refill ex-bourbon cask, this single malt comes from the Speyside region distillery - Aberlour. 1 of only 189 bottles.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 10 Year Old - 1990s
DESCRIPTION: An iconic old-style 70cl bottling of Glenmorangie 10 Year old with classic presentation tin.

NAME: Glenkinchie - 10 Year Old (75cl)
DESCRIPTION: This 10-year-old is an older style bottling from Glenkinchie Distillery. The Glenkinchie 10-year-old has since been replaced by the 12-year-old.

NAME: Highland Park - Gordon & MacPahil 2001 #3000 - Viking Line
