NAME: Talisker - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: An older release of 10 Year Old from Talisker distillery on the Isle of Skye.  Aged for a minimum of 10 years in American oak casks.

NAME: Jim Beam - Beam Listed NYSE
DESCRIPTION:
Jim Beam released this special bottling to mark the date and celebrate the company being listed on the New York Stock Exchange.
This event took place on October 4th 2011 and is most certainly one for the collectors.

NAME: Laphroaig - Quarter Cask
DESCRIPTION: A younger, lively Laphroaig that has had the maturation process speeded up by ageing in quarter casks.  As the size of the cask is smaller the maturation doesn't need to be as long. This process has created a soft sweetness and a velvety feel when first tasted, then the intense peatiness so unique to Laphroaig comes bursting through.

NAME: Highland Park - Viking Tribe
DESCRIPTION:
Released in 2018, this new release from Highland Park was originally only available through Amazon UK. 
"Viking Tribe" is now part of the core Highland Park range. 
This single malt was released as a celebration of the togetherness shown by the Vikings.

NAME: Highland Park - Viking Tribe
DESCRIPTION:
Released in 2018, this new release from Highland Park was originally only available through Amazon UK. 
"Viking Tribe" is now part of the core Highland Park range. 
This single malt was released as a celebration of the togetherness shown by the Vikings.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - Discovery Miniature Gift Set 5 x 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
A gift set that has 5 miniature from the Johnnie Walker core range:
Black LabelDouble BlackGold Label Reserve18 Year OldBlue Label
All bottles are 5cl at 40%

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Viking Honour + Dragon Legend 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park has revamped their packaging and the embossing on this bottle really does look as good as it tastes. 
This gift set includes a 5cl of Highland Park Dragon Legend (43.1% ABV)

NAME: Glenlossie - 11 Year Old - Halliburton
DESCRIPTION: This Glenlossie 11 Year Old was matured in Oak casks and bottled by Duncan Taylor specially for Halliburton.

NAME: Arran - Sherry Cask Finish
DESCRIPTION: The malt has been matured in a oak casks before being finished in sherry casks at the Arran Lochranza Warehouse. Each of their casks are chosen by the team at Arran distillery. This bottling was chosen by James Mactaggart.

NAME: Scottish Parliament - 15 Year Old The Member's Blend
DESCRIPTION: A blended malt with a minimum age of 15 years, this bottling was produced by Gordon and Macphail. It was chosen for the Scottish parliament.

NAME: Glencadam - 6 Year Old Batch 1 That Boutique-y Whisky Company
DESCRIPTION:
That Boutique-y Whisky Company, bottles all manner of incredible whiskies from top distilleries and brands from around the world.
This Glencadam is from the first batch made for That Boutique-y Whisky Company. It has been aged for 6 years and there are 454 individually numbered bottles.

NAME: Bowmore - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a 70cl bottling of 12-Year-Old Bowmore. This single malt has coastal notes with gentle peat.

NAME: Bushmills - 10 Year Old (1L)
DESCRIPTION: This popular Irish whiskey has been triple distilled and aged 10 years. It was matured in bourbon and oloroso sherry casks for notes of honey, vanilla and ripe fruit.

NAME: Paul John - Brilliance Indian Single Malt
DESCRIPTION: This is from a unique whisky distillery called Paul John in Goa, India.

NAME: Tomatin - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This Tomatin 12 Year Old was released prior to 2014 as it was bottled at 40% (after 2014, it was bottled at 43%) It was matured in a bourbon cask and finished in Spanish sherry casks. The result is a sweet whisky with notes of apples, citrus and sweet spice.

NAME: Poit Dhubh - 12 Year Old - Mac Na Braiche (1980)
DESCRIPTION: This 12-year-old blended Scotch whisky from Poit Dhubh was bottled in the 1980s for Phraban-na Linne Ltd of the Isle of Skye.  This is a 75cl bottling.

NAME: The Gordon - Highlanders (Bicentenary)
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: William Grant  Sons Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Gordon Highlanders scotch whisky is a blended whisky.  It is named after the Gordon Highlanders regiment of the British Army.  This bottling celebrates the Bicentenary of the Gordon Highlanders Regiment 1794-1994 which was named after the Clan Gordon.

NAME: An Cnoc - 12 Years Old
DESCRIPTION:
AnCnoc 12 Year Old is from the Knockdhu distillery.
An older release of AnCnoc 12 year old from Knockdhu distillery.

NAME: Glen Moray - 12 Year Old (1980s)
DESCRIPTION: This old presentation style Glen Moray malt was aged for 12 years.

NAME: Ice & Fire - Caithness Raiders Rum
DESCRIPTION:
From the Caithness region in the Highlands of Scotland comes this Oak-aged rum from the Ice & Fire distillery.
Caithness distillery is surrounded on both sides by sea and lets not forget the infamous Pentland Firth to the North. 
This rum has been described as sweet and compelling.

NAME: Bowmore - No.1
DESCRIPTION: Bowmore No.1 is made up from single malt aged in first-fill bourbon casks and is named after Bowmore's famous No.1 Vaults on Islay.

NAME: Royal Lochnagar - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a 12 year old single malt from Royal Lochnagar Distillery. It is of the three distilleries in Scotland ever to be granted the title of 'Royal' in front of their name.

NAME: House of Bruar - Highland Single Malt
DESCRIPTION:
A single malt whisky produced for the House of Bruar. This is a Highland single malt. 
The company was established in 1993. 
Bottle number 100.

NAME: Spirit Of Freedom 62
DESCRIPTION:
A blended Scotch whisky from the Springbank distillery's owners, J& A Mitchell. A blend of 62 different whiskies from all around Scotland.
'62' because 62% of people of Scotland voted by 62%-38% to stay in the EU.

NAME: Ardbeg - 1975 Gordon and Macphail Connoisseurs Choice 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
The Ardbeg was distilled in 1975 and is part of the Gordon and Macphail Connoisseurs Choice range.
With the distillery installing a new still house, could this bottle become even more sought after as time goes on?

NAME: Ardbeg - Supernova - 2014 Committee Release 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg Supernova SN2014 is one of the peatiest (110ppm) and explosively flavoured Ardbegs ever.  This limited edition Committee Release celebrates the incredible story that Ardbeg successfully launched whisky into space and it returned. 
This is a 5cl bottling.

NAME: Glenlivet - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a newer style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet. The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers.

NAME: Ardbeg - 17 Year Old (5cl)
DESCRIPTION: Ardbeg 17 year old is an increasingly rare bottling, it has been discontinued for a good few years. The first bottling of this sparked the revival of Ardbeg's fortunes after the takeover by Glenmorangie. This is a 5cl bottling.

NAME: Glenlivet - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a newer style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet. The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers.

NAME: Cardhu - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: Cardhu 12 year old single malt whisky from Speyside, Scotland.  This single malt was purely produced at the distillery in Morayshire, Scotland.  Although recognised as a Speyside whisky, they actually advertise being Highland Scotch Whisky.

NAME: Highland Park - 10 Year Old - Rebus 30 Rankin
DESCRIPTION: Released in June 2017, REBUS30 10 Year Old marks the 30th anniversary of the publication of the first ‘Inspector Rebus’ novel, Knots & Crosses.  John Rebus, the creation of best-selling crime writer Ian Rankin, is now one of the most iconic figures of modern crime fiction.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park 12 Year Old - one of the best malts in the world year on year. This bottling has been in its core range for over 100 years.
Michael Jackson, Malt Whisky Companion regards this whisky as "The greatest all-rounder in the world of malt whisky."

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old - Viking Honour
DESCRIPTION: Highland Park has revamped their packaging and the embossing on this bottle really does look as good as it tastes.

NAME: Glenmorangie - 10 Year Old - The Original
DESCRIPTION: A lovely bottling of Glenmorangie 10 year old, with presentation box. The 'original' sets a high standard for Highland whisky, and has gone from strength to strength since its slightly controversial packaging redesign a few years ago.

NAME: Auchentoshan - American Oak
DESCRIPTION: This triple distilled single malt scotch whisky from the Auchentoshan Distillery comes from a first fill North American oak casks. This bottling has a vanilla and coconut sweetness from a first fill bourbon casks.

NAME: Cardhu - Gold Reserve - Cask Selection
DESCRIPTION: Cardhu is known for being an easy-drinking and sweeter style of whisky. This Gold Reserve Cask Selection has been made with the finest Cardhu casks; the whisky has been aged in toasted oak casks, which has led to notes of toffee apples whisky.

NAME: Old Pulteney - Row to the Pole - 35cl
DESCRIPTION:
A limited edition, half bottle of Old Pulteney created especially to celebrate their Row to The Pole team, who rowed to the magnetic North Pole in 2011 - the first group ever to do so.
This is a traditional Pulteney dram, with sea air and citrus, packaged in a small sailcloth bag, perfect for hiding away a half bottle when on a small boat.

NAME: Highland Park - Dragon Legend
DESCRIPTION: From 2017 this slightly higher % from their core range represents the Orkney distillery in a great fashion.   Very rich and on the smokier side for Highland Park.

NAME: Glenlivet - 12 Year Old - 70cl + 5cl Mini
DESCRIPTION:
This lot includes a 70cl and 5cl.
This is a newer style bottling of the popular dram, known as 'The single malt that started it all' for Glenlivet. The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers.

NAME: Timorous Beastie - Douglas Laing Small Batch
DESCRIPTION: A limited-edition bottling of this small batch #1. The Timorous Beastie Highland blended malt Scotch whisky was matured and bottled at 46.8% ABV. It has tasting sweet tasting notes including warm syrup over sponge and ripe, juicy nectarines.

NAME: Ardmore - Traditional Cask (1L)
DESCRIPTION: Ardmore Traditional Cask is a double cask matured whisky. It was aged in bourbon barrels. The final maturation was in quarter casks to help enrich the whisky due to the smaller size of the cask type. It is a lightly smokey and rich Highland whisky.  The 2007 release of this 'Traditional Cask' was the first official single malt from the Ardmore distillery, this is a young whisky, but it was aged in quarter casks.

NAME: English Whisky Co. - Chapter 4
DESCRIPTION: A peated malt spirit from England's only distillery, the Norfolk-based St George's. Matured for only 22 months in a first-fill American bourbon cask, it therefore can't be called whisky.

NAME: English Whisky Co. - Chapter 11
DESCRIPTION: Heavily peated English Malt Whisky from Englands only disttillery, the Norfolk based St George’s. A recent award winner at the World Whisky Masters. 70cl, 46%.

NAME: Penderyn - Legend
DESCRIPTION: This Penderyn has been matured in ex-bourbon American Oak before finishing in ex-Madeira oak barriques.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park 12 year old - one of the best malts in the world year on year. This bottling has been in their core range for over 100 years!
The classic 1990's bottling was whisky author Michael Jackson’s favourite tipple.

NAME: Famous Grouse - 12 Year Old - Gold Reserve
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Famous Grouse 12 Year Old Gold Reserve has now been discontinued. It was released to celebrate a centenary of the Famous Grouse brand.  It is said to be of premium quality with a good proportion of malt whiskies (including Macallan and Highland Park) in the blend.

NAME: Laphroaig - Select
DESCRIPTION: Laphroaig  Select has been created using a combination of whisky from a number of different types of cask, including Oloroso Sherry butts, white American oak, Pedro Ximenez seasoned hogsheads, quarter casks and first-fill bourbon casks.

NAME: Famous Grouse - 12 Year Old - Gold Reserve
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Famous Grouse 12 Year Old Gold Reserve has now been discontinued. It was released to celebrate a centenary of the Famous Grouse brand.  It is said to be of premium quality with a good proportion of malt whiskies (including Macallan and Highland Park) in the blend.

NAME: Glenlivet - 12 Year Old (Leather Case)
DESCRIPTION: The Glenlivet 12 Year Old has a soft smooth balance of sweet summer fruits and the floral notes of spring flowers. This bottling comes in a leather style presentation case.

NAME: That Boutique-y Whisky - World Whisky Blend 41.6%
DESCRIPTION:
From That Boutique-y Whisky Company themself - 
World Whisky Blend has been designed with the world in mind. A harmonious blend of whiskies from across the breadth of planet earth, to achieve a truly global flavour.
While beautiful neat, this blend has been designed to be mixed to celebrate the way the WORLD really drinks whisky. The blend includes whiskies from: Scotland, Canada, Ireland, Sweden, USA, Switzerland, Netherlands, Taiwan, India, Italy, Germany (Bavaria), France, Japan and Finland.
With 7 Wonders of The Whisky World, discover the true diversity of the wonderful Whisky World, in all its remarkable forms and flavours!

NAME: Bowmore - 12 Year Old - 1980's - 5cl
DESCRIPTION: This is a 5cl bottling of 12-Year-Old Bowmore. This single malt has coastal notes with gentle peat.

NAME: That Boutique-y Whisky - World Whisky Blend 41.6%
DESCRIPTION:
From That Boutique-y Whisky Company themself - 
World Whisky Blend has been designed with the world in mind. A harmonious blend of whiskies from across the breadth of planet earth, to achieve a truly global flavour.
While beautiful neat, this blend has been designed to be mixed to celebrate the way the WORLD really drinks whisky. The blend includes whiskies from: Scotland, Canada, Ireland, Sweden, USA, Switzerland, Netherlands, Taiwan, India, Italy, Germany (Bavaria), France, Japan and Finland.
With 7 Wonders of The Whisky World, discover the true diversity of the wonderful Whisky World, in all its remarkable forms and flavours!

NAME: Glen Moray - 12 Year Old (1980s)
DESCRIPTION: This old presentation style Glen Moray malt was aged for 12 years. A very rare, now antique bottling.  This is a 75cl bottling.

NAME: Aberlour - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A 10 year old distilled and bottled by Aberlour Glenlivet Distillery.  It has been matured in sherry and bourbon casks.

NAME: Finlaggan - Old Reserve - Islay Single Malt
DESCRIPTION:
Finlaggan is from an unknown Islay distillery.
"The Lord Of The Isles".

NAME: Jura - 10 Year Old
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Isle of Jura Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: A bottle of Jura 10 Year Old.  Originally built in 1810, the distillery fell into disrepair and wasn't revived until the 1960's by two local estate owners.

NAME: Ardbeg - Supernova - 2014 Committee Release 5cl
DESCRIPTION:
Ardbeg Supernova SN2014 is one of the peatiest (110ppm) and explosively flavoured Ardbegs ever.  This limited edition Committee Release celebrates the incredible story that Ardbeg successfully launched whisky into space and it returned. 
This is a 5cl bottling.

NAME: Tullibardine - 10 Year - Old Style
DESCRIPTION: This is a rare, old-style bottling from Highland Distillery Tullibardine.

NAME: Speyside - 12 Year Old - Marks & Spencer
DESCRIPTION: A smooth Speyside 12-year-old single malt, bottled for Marks & Spencer.

NAME: Bermersheimer Hildegardisberg - Rheinhessen
DESCRIPTION: This was produced for Schroder Family 775th Anniversary of Quakenbruck in 2010. 13.5%. It is burgundy, late-harvest dry wine.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old Water jug
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park is known for being the most Northern Scotch Whisky Distillery in the world. It is situated on the outskirts of the biggest town in Orkney 58.9847°N. It is so far North it is almost in the Arctic circle. To give you an idea, it is on the same latitude as Anchorage, Alaska.
The distillery has been distilling in the same site since 1798 where the founder, Magnus Eunson’s, original illicit still was at High Park.
They smoke their own barley from over 4,000 year old peat which has been cut from the Hobbister Moor only seven miles from the distillery.
This is a very rare find, an older water just that would have matched a set for the 12 year old expression.

NAME: Highland Park - Water jug
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park is known for being the most Northern Scotch Whisky Distillery in the world. It is situated on the outskirts of the biggest town in Orkney 58.9847°N. It is so far North it is almost in the Arctic circle. To give you an idea, it is on the same latitude as Anchorage, Alaska.
The distillery has been distilling in the same site since 1798 where the founder, Magnus Eunson’s, original illicit still was at High Park.
They smoke their own barley from over 4,000 year old peat which has been cut from the Hobbister Moor only seven miles from the distillery.
This is a very rare find, an older water just that would go perfectly in any collection.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION:
Highland Park 12 year old - one of the best malts in the world year on year. This bottling has been in its core range for over 100 years!
The classic 1990's bottling was whisky author Michael Jackson’s favourite tipple.

NAME: Bowmore - 10 Year Old - 1988 Glasgow Garden Festival (5cl)
DESCRIPTION: This 5cl miniature bottling commemorates the Glasgow Garden Festival 1988.

NAME: Glen Dochart - 8 Year Old - Pure Malt (1980s)
DESCRIPTION: A 70cl bottling of Glen Dochart 8 Year Old Pure Malt.

NAME: Glen Darbach - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A 12 year old single malt, bottled for Marks & Spencer.

NAME: Grant's - Family Reserve
DESCRIPTION: This blended whisky from William Grant & Sons was awarded a Silver medal at the 2007 International Wine and Spirits Competition.  This blend includes whisky from Glenfiddich & Balvenie.

NAME: Jura - Journey
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Isle of Jura Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: Jura Journey is said to be a perfect introduction to the Isle of Jura range (which was relaunched in mid-2018).  It has been aged exclusively in American white oak ex-bourbon barrels and was bottled at 40% ABV.

NAME: Tamnavulin - Double Cask
DESCRIPTION: The first official bottling of Tamnavulin for more than two decades. The Double Cask has been aged in American oak and finished in sherry butts. The result is a whisky with notes of dried orange, ginger and wood spice.

NAME: Inverey - 12 Year Old Highland Single Malt
DESCRIPTION:
A Highland single malt that has been matured for 12 years and bottled by Burn Stewart Distillers.
The bottling was commissioned by Marks and Spencer the UK supermarket chain. 
Officially Inverey is from an undisclosed Highland distillery. However, it doesn't take much detective work to figure it out considering Burn Stewart are the owners of Deanston at the time.

NAME: Ben Bracken - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This Ben Bracken 12-Year-Old single malt from Speyside was bottled by Clydesdale Scotch Whisky Co. Glasgow.

NAME: Spirit Of Freedom 62
DESCRIPTION:
A blended Scotch whisky from the Springbank distillery's owners, J& A Mitchell. A blend of 62 different whiskies from all around Scotland.
'62' because 62% of people of Scotland voted by 62%-38% to stay in the EU.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - White Walker
DESCRIPTION:
A limited edition whisky from Johnnie Walker, inspired by the super popular television programme, Game of Thrones.
This new blend features malts from Cardhu and Clynelish and is presented at a strength of 41.7% abv. The bottle has a temperature-sensitive graphic that will spell out the words “Winter is here” when it's at the right temperature for serving.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - White Walker
DESCRIPTION:
A limited edition whisky from Johnnie Walker, inspired by the super popular television programme, Game of Thrones.
This new blend features malts from Cardhu and Clynelish and is presented at a strength of 41.7% abv. The bottle has a temperature-sensitive graphic that will spell out the words “Winter is here” when it's at the right temperature for serving.

NAME: Bowmore - 10 Year Old - Black Mike (5cl)
DESCRIPTION:
This 5cl Bowmore 10-Year-Old is was bottled for the RAF to celebrate both the 30th anniversary of Treble-One’s “Black Arrows” and mark the final years of FG.1 service. This is one of just 582 bottles.
This is bottle number 105.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - 12 Year Old - Black Label
DESCRIPTION: Johnnie Walker Black Label's iconic square bottle makes it one of the world's most recognisable whiskies.  It is a blend of around 40 whiskies.

NAME: Bushmills - Irish Whiskey (1L)
DESCRIPTION: Distilled 3 times and a beautifully smooth mellow taste. They claim to be the worlds oldest whiskey distillery but I am sure there are a few who might contest this point...

NAME: Johnnie Walker - White Walker
DESCRIPTION:
A limited edition whisky from Johnnie Walker, inspired by the super popular television programme, Game of Thrones.
This new blend features malts from Cardhu and Clynelish and is presented at a strength of 41.7% abv. The bottle has a temperature-sensitive graphic that will spell out the words “Winter is here” when it's at the right temperature for serving.

NAME: North Port - 1970 Gordon and Macphail Connoisseurs Choice 5cl
DESCRIPTION: The North Port was distilled in 1970 and is part of the Gordon and Macphail Connoisseurs Choice range.

NAME: Auchentoshan - Classic
DESCRIPTION: This Lowland single malt whisky from the Auchentoshan distillery is a younger malt though certainly an enjoyable one.  'Classic' was launched in 2008 to replace 'Select'. It’s aimed to attract the new malt whisky drinkers.

NAME: Auchentoshan - Classic
DESCRIPTION: This Lowland single malt whisky from the Auchentoshan distillery is a younger malt though certainly an enjoyable one.  'Classic' was launched in 2008 to replace 'Select'. It’s aimed to attract the new malt whisky drinkers.

NAME: Glen Moray - Classic
DESCRIPTION: Glen Moray is quietly matured on the banks of the River Lossie in Elgin, the capital of Speyside.

NAME: William Lawson's - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: This is a 12-Year-old rich blended whisky from William Lawson.

NAME: Bushmills - Irish Whiskey (1L)
DESCRIPTION: Distilled 3 times and a beautifully smooth mellow taste. They claim to be the worlds oldest whiskey distillery but I am sure there are a few who might contest this point...

NAME: Loch Lomond - Original
DESCRIPTION: This Loch Lomond single malt was matured in American Oak Casks and is a subtly peated dram.

NAME: Speyside - 12 Year Old - Marks & Spencer
DESCRIPTION: A smooth Speyside 12-year-old single malt, bottled for Marks & Spencer.

NAME: Tamnavulin - Double Cask
DESCRIPTION: The first official bottling of Tamnavulin for more than two decades. The Double Cask has been aged in American oak and finished in sherry butts. The result is a whisky with notes of dried orange, ginger and wood spice.

NAME: Old Pulteney - 12 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: Matured only in air-dried, hand-selected ex-bourbon casks, Old Pulteney 12-Year-Old Whisky has won many awards. Lingering sea tastes with a sweetness.

NAME: Lowland - Glen Whisy
DESCRIPTION: A bottle of blended Lowland whisky, bottled at 40%.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - Red Label
DESCRIPTION: Johnnie Walker Red Label was launched in its current form by brothers George and Alexander Walker in 1909, though it had existed as Walker's Special Old Highland Red Label for some years previously. Today it is one of the worlds most popular blends.

NAME: Aberlour - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A 10 year old distilled and bottled by Aberlour Glenlivet Distillery.  It has been matured in sherry and bourbon casks.

NAME: Aberlour - 10 Year Old
DESCRIPTION: A 10 year old distilled and bottled by Aberlour Glenlivet Distillery.  It has been matured in sherry and bourbon casks.

NAME: Johnnie Walker - 12 Year Old - Black Label
DESCRIPTION:
Johnnie Walker Black Label's iconic square bottle makes it one of the world's most recognisable whiskies.  It is a blend of around 40 whiskies. 
Please note the direction of the stringing man which has now changed...

NAME: Seagram's - 100 Pipers Deluxe
DESCRIPTION: A 70cl bottling of Seagram's 100 Pipers Deluxe blended Scotch whisky, which was named after the 100 pipers that followed Bonnie Prince Charlie into battle.

NAME: 8 x Assorted Minatures
DESCRIPTION: Contains 8 x 5cl whisky miniatures:

NAME: Glen Moray - Elgin Classic
DESCRIPTION: Glen Moray is quietly matured on the banks of the River Lossie in Elgin, the capital of Speyside.

NAME: Jura - 10 Year Old
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: Isle of Jura Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION: A bottle of Jura 10 Year Old.  Originally built in 1810, the distillery fell into disrepair and wasn't revived until the 1960's by two local estate owners.

NAME: Peaky Blinder - Bourbon Whisky
DESCRIPTION: The Peaky Blinder range now features a bourbon whiskey, matured in American Oak. This is a flavourful and good value bourbon produced in Indiana for the Peaky Blinder range by Sadler's.

NAME: Paddy - Irish Whiskey
DESCRIPTION:
Paddy Flaherty was a salesman for Cork distilleries and this bottling was blended/bottled at NEw Midleton distillery. 
This has been triple distilled blended Irish dram that contains single pot still, single malt and grain using recipe PF20010694.

NAME: Aerstone - 10 Year Old Land
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: William Grant  Sons Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION:
Aerstone Sea Cask comes from William Grant at 10 years old.
Its a single malt from the Ailsa Bay Distillery and is the sibling of the Sea Cask. 
The sea cask is also 10 years old and it maturation wasn't spent at sea, although those maritime notes were soaked up in the warehouses by the sea on the Ayrshire coast. 
This variant is a smoky single malt thanks to the use of Highland peat, making for a sweet and smoky dram. It was also stored further inland.

NAME: Glen Moray - Elgin Classic
DESCRIPTION: Glen Moray is quietly matured on the banks of the River Lossie in Elgin, the capital of Speyside.

NAME: Drumguish - Single Highland Malt
DESCRIPTION: A non-age statement single malt from Drumguish distillery - which was founded in Speyside in 1956.

NAME: The Talisman
DESCRIPTION:
Talisman Scotch Whisky, produced by J & W Hardie.
Labelled as "The Finest Blended Scotch whisky."

NAME: Louisville - Blended Bourbon
DESCRIPTION: Produced exclusively for a major UK food retailer, this is a 70cl bottling of Louisville blended bourbon, bottled at 40%.

NAME: Highland Park - 12 Year Old (35cl)
DESCRIPTION:
A 35cl bottling.  Highland Park 12 Year Old - one of the best malts in the world year on year. This bottling has been in its core range for over 100 years.
Michael Jackson, Malt Whisky Companion regards this whisky as "The greatest all-rounder in the world of malt whisky."

NAME: Imperial - 1970 Connoisseurs Choice - Gordon & MacPhail (5cl)
DESCRIPTION: Distilled in 1970, this Imperial was bottled by Gordon and MacPhail as part of the Connoisseurs Choice range.  This is a mini 5cl bottling.

NAME: Royal Brackla - 1970 Gordon and Macphail Connoisseurs Choice 5cl
DESCRIPTION: The Royal Brackla was distilled in 1970 and is part of the Gordon and Macphail Connoisseurs Choice range.

DESCRIPTION: This lot includes 10 x 5cl:

NAME: The Famous Grouse
DISTILLERY / BLENDER: The Famous Grouse Whisky for auction
DESCRIPTION:
This Famous Grouse blend is made from 100% Scotch Whiskies including the Edrington-owned Highland Park and The Macallan. 
Famous Grouse blended scotch whisky was first produced by Matthew Gloag & Son Ltd in 1896, and is currently produced and owned by The Edrington Group.

NAME: Ardbeg - 10 Year Old (3 x 5cl)
DESCRIPTION:
This lot includes 3 x 5cl bottlings of Ardbeg 10 Year Old. 
Ardbeg Ten Year Old is known around the world as the peatiest, smokiest, most complex single malt of them all. Yet it does not flaunt the peat; rather it gives way to the natural sweetness of the malt to produce a whisky of perfect balance. Named World Whisky of the Year in 2008.
Produced on the Kildalton Coast of Islay, this single malt matures for a decade before being bottled without any chill-filtration with a strength of 46% ABV.

NAME: Säntis Malt - Edition Sigel (20cl)
DESCRIPTION: This Swiss malt Edition Sigel makes use of small oak beer casks in production. Matured at an altitude of approx. 780 m and hot summers and cold winters for at least 4 years in 50-litre beer barrels.
